programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Tiffany, Modern Cutouts and Pink Orchids Wedding Cakes
programme.desc: The Tiffany-inspired cake is black and white with blue accents, and creates tension in the OC bakery as Chris pushes for perfection. The CakeGirls tackle a modern cake with cutouts and the NY bakery adds stenciling to a white cake with orchids.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Pirate Ship Cake Diner Desserts Bridal Shower Cake Magnolia Cake
programme.desc: The LA team crafts a sea-worthy Pirate Ship cake, while Christopher Garren's bakery draws inspiration from a diner for a bridal shower cake. And Ben at the Chicago bakery challenges his artistic side working on a Magnolia-inspired wedding cake.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Wheel of Cheese Groom's Cake, A Picnic Wedding Cake, Calla Lilies Cake
programme.desc: The Chicago girls whip up a picnic cake with a roasted-pig topper the LA bakery makes a cheesecake that looks like (what else) a wheel of cheese and Christopher Garren's Cakes creates an elegant cake with inverted tiers and yellow calla lilies.

programme.title: Amazing Wedding Cakes: Roses and Stripes Wedding Cake, Scroll Motif Wedding Cake, Bobble Head Groom's Cake
programme.desc: The CakeGirls construct a "bobble head" groom's cake Reva designs a vivid cake with black-and-white stripes and apple-green fondant and the women in NY battle a heat wave, which threatens to wilt their fondant and melt their iced stencil designs.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Liane & Danny
programme.desc: It's hard to top a $250,000 engagement ring, but Liane and Danny do! Their own beach front estate becomes a wedding extravaganza with spectacular lighting and an acrylic dance floor over their swimming pool!

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Kristin & Gary
programme.desc: Kristin and Gary had a winter wonderland wedding in Colorado. Friends and family enjoyed snowy activities before entering a beautiful ski lodge for their wedding.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Carly & Jason
programme.desc: Carly and Jason created a winter wonderland in Texas. Their reception featured snowfall lighting effects and specialty fabric that sparkled like snow.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Nikoo & Hossein
programme.desc: Nikoo and Hossein create an exquisite high-end event in Beverly Hills. This couple blended elaborate Persian traditions with a French country theme, making this their dream wedding.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Tanya & Jonathan
programme.desc: A cake that is a magical replica of Cinderella's carriage is showcased in this Platinum Wedding! Tanya and Jonathan's guests enjoy a $35,000 cake that is sure to be talked about for years to come.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Valentina & Shail
programme.desc: Valentina and Shail tie the knot in an architectural gem in Florida. This fashion industry couple fell in love ten years ago!

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Danielle & Todd
programme.desc: Old Hollywood meets Art Deco at Danielle and Todd's Los Angeles wedding. Planner Kevin Covey helps transform the storied Millennium Ballroom into an elegant dream.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Eda & Dave
programme.desc: A gorgeous fall themed wedding in the Pennsylvania countryside. Eda and Dave are delighted by their celebrity planner friend, David Tutera.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Sajid & Gabe
programme.desc: Sajid and Gabe's reception was rockin' all night! A New Year's wedding with an Asian and Cuban theme keep the festivities going!

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Joanna & Michael
programme.desc: Celebrity planner David Tutera creates jaw-dropping decor for a hot young Philadelphia couple.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Amy & David
programme.desc: A Los Angeles club owner surprises his sexy model fiance with a $215,000 diamond bracelet.

programme.title: Platinum Weddings: Ariel & Joe
programme.desc: Every glamorous detail is executed to perfection in a wedding where the bride is also the planner.

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Ken Doll and the Cliff Diver
programme.desc: Patti takes on Justin, the "Human Ken Doll" and Claudia, a 3x divorcee who cliff dives into toxic relationships. As painful pasts are revealed, can Patti break their bad dating habits and find them love?

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Princess and the Man Boy
programme.desc: A former Princess must learn to leave behind the baggage of her royal past to look toward a future. A comedian uses his jokes to deflect intimacy. Patti gets ambushed. Ex-employees Destin and Rachel are back!

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: Farrah Abraham and the Obsessed Dad
programme.desc: Teen Mom's Farrah Abraham, a reality star infamous for being in the adult industry, and an overprotective father who needs his sexy back, seek Patti's help to find love.

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: Loosey Goosey and Mr. Forever 21
programme.desc: Patti takes on Anna Lisa, a party girl who needs to curb her playgirl ways and get serious about love. And Tony, Patti's friend who dates too young needs an intervention or he could end up alone forever.

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Pop Star and American Psycho
programme.desc: Patti takes on a high-powered perfectionist who can't find his "perfect" match and an overtly sexual singer who leads with her body, and not her heart. Both clients check out with someone they never expected...

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Dumped DJ and Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Derek, a fashion designer who is too shallow to settle, and Traci, a DJ who harbors major trust issues, seek Patti's help for love. One client begs for a second chance when their contract gets revoked!

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Ice Queen and the Playboy Chef
programme.desc: Drama erupts when Patti tries to thaw an Ice Queen's frozen heart. Chef Roble, who must whip up a balance between love and work, checks in. All hell breaks loose when one client tests Patti's patience.

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Crying Virgin and the Gullible
programme.desc: The Bachelor's infamous crying virgin, Ashley I., must let go of her past and open her heart. Dakota, a gullible artist, has to learn to turn a blind eye and start paying attention to deal breakers.

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: Immature Bridesmaid and the Ex from the Block
programme.desc: The delusional millionairess, Robin Kassner, returns but must drop the ditzy act and the wine straw for true love. Ojani Noa, J.Lo's ex-husband, must move past his playboy ways. One client gets suspended!

programme.title: Million Dollar Matchmaker: The Doormat and the Lazy Lion
programme.desc: Angelica Bridges, a former Baywatch babe and divorcee must overcome her self-sabotaging ways. Ralph Rieckermann, a former rock star must drop the groupies in order to find his soul mate.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Four" - On the fourth day, the remaining chefs compete in a blindfold taste test. The losers must accept a difficult punishment while the winners dine with Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Five" - To advance in this challenge, the seven remaining chefs must purchase and prepare food for a wedding reception.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Six" - Melissa joins the men in a competition to see which team can prepare better lobster dishes. But there's a catch: the teams must kill their crustaceans first.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Seven " - The six remaining contestants must make appetizers and entrées from leftovers, then both teams must craft their own menus for the evening's dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Eight" - Chef Ramsay consolidates the five remaining contestants into one team, but first they must compete against one another to impress 100 hungry high school students.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Nine" - The three remaining chefs prepare gourmet versions of classic American dishes for outside judges: their mothers, who don't know whose plates they're sampling.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Ten (Part One)" - The final two contestants take on a final challenge that involves more than just cooking: they must design and manage their own restaurants.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Ten (Part Two) " - In the season finale, tempers flare as the two contestants prepare one last dinner service for Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 15 Chefs Compete" - Chef Gordon Ramsay returns for a fourth season of culinary torture. Fifteen chefs will compete for the chance to work at Ramsay's own restaurant in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 14 Chefs Compete" - The season's first challenge finds the contestants slicing halibut into thin six-ounce fillets. One member of each team must serve as maître d' during the dining service.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Dillon's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is in the Big Apple to revamp Dillon's, an Indian restaurant just blocks away from his own thriving eatery. Stubborn owner Mohammed loses approximately $25,000-$50,000 a month.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Casa Roma
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Casa Roma, an Italian restaurant in Lancaster, California. Although its bar is packed, Casa Roma's dining area is nearly empty. Most of the problems stem from the inexperienced owners managing a clueless kitchen staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mama Rita's
programme.desc: Ramsay finds that the Mexican eatery Mama Rita's suffers from a disorganized kitchen. Meanwhile, the owner may have to sacrifice a friendship in order to save her business.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Anna Vincenzo's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Anna Vincenzo's, a family-run eatery in Boca Raton, Florida. He learns that the stubborn owner doesn't welcome change. After his ideas are ignored, Ramsay walks out.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited #3
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay revisits some of the worst restaurants previously encountered: Handlebar and the Black Pearl (season two) and Casa Roma (season three) to see how they are doing. There's good news, bad news, and a surprise.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Fleming
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Fleming, a Danish eatery in Miami. The stubborn owner doesn't want to update the place and Ramsay discovers something in the cooler that leads him to close the restaurant.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sushi Ko
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay finds a failing second location of a family-owned eatery. Debt, a breakdown of the family dynamic and a relative who has lost his passion for cooking all plague the restaurant.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited #2
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay revisits restaurants Giuseppi and Sante La Brea, from season two, to see if they have succeeded there is good news and there is bad news. Also included is an update on what happened at Finn McCool's.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Spanish Pavillion
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey. He discovers that a pair of bickering brothers are running the eatery to the ground with their undercooked food and outdated atmosphere.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Classic American
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay arrives at debt-ridden eatery owned by two former waitresses. Things are so bad that Ramsay holds an intervention to address leadership and communication problems.

programme.desc: Después de la caída de un infame narco-líder, el coronel Diana está lista para tomarse un descanso de la policía y trabajar para arreglar su matrimonio. Su jefe, sin embargo, tiene otros planes y le asigna al coronel Diana su mayor misión hasta la fecha: desmantelar "el Clan del Norte" dirigido por los hermanos Zurria y sus aliados oficiales corruptos y funcionarios del gobierno.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E216
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is singer Sam Kim! This artist made himself known to the public in 2013 as the runner-up of the popular talent show "K-pop Star Season 3." Then he made his official debut in 2016 and has been mesmerizing listeners with his velvety voice and songwriting skills since then. Thanks to his outstanding musicality, he has also worked with a number of A-list musicians, including IU, Crush, Zico, and more. In June this year, Sam Kim released his new single "The Juice" after a break of about 2 years. With a blend of retro pop and hip hop, this autobiographic song depicts his worn-out state of mind interestingly through groovy dance moves. So he has proved that he can sing, compose, and even dance, making us eagerly anticipate what more he has in store for us. In this episode, Sam Kim performs "The Juice," "Make Up," "Seattle" and more to showcase the quintessence of his artistry. Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet this talented singer!

programme.title: Live Together

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E219
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is singer-songwriter Damons year! This artist started his career as a musician in 2017 with the song "Couldn't Sleep." Since then, he has mesmerized listeners with his heartwarming melodies and sentiments. Also known for his poetic lyrics like "I will hold your hands, you can just relax," "It was like an ice burn," "Then one light came into my blurry eyes it reached its hand out and lifted me up," he presents music that suits all 365 days and 12 months of the year just like his stage name Damons year (day, month, year). In this episode, he performs "Rainbow," "ai," "Cherry," "Your Knight," "yours," and "Pattern" to showcase the essence of his artistry. In this episode, JANNABI performs "A Ballad of Non Le Jon," "Confession Show," "The King of Romance," "Time," "I Know Where The Rainbow has Fallen," and "Bluebird, Spread your wings!" Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet this talented musician!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Josh Sneed - Live in the Dessert
programme.desc: Hailing from the great city of Cincinnati, Ohio, Josh comes to Dry Bar to bring “new life” to his comedy. Being funny 24/7 can be difficult, but Josh Sneed does it. Watch “Live in the Dessert” by Josh Sneed now!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Soelberg - Pirate Hymns
programme.desc: Steve Soelberg might actually be a human ray of sunshine. Riffing on his ultra-conservative upbringing, this special balances jokes about the tune of church hymns with hilarious observations of the seemingly mundane.

programme.title: Brian Moote - Getting Schooled
programme.desc: Brian Moote started performing stand up in 2005 while he was working as a teacher in the Seattle School District. He then went to graduate school to get a masters degree in social work because who doesn't love crippling debt? I mean, this is America. After graduating he moved to LA and now tours the country telling jokes. He has made TV appearances on the USA Network's "Characters Welcome," Nickelodeon's "Nickmom's Nite Out," MTV's "Money from Strangers" and AXS TV's "Gotham Live." You should come out and see him tell jokes... DO IT!!!

programme.title: Brad Upton - Will Be Funny For Money
programme.desc: Brad Upton first stepped on stage in September of 1984 and he's never looked back. This ex-grade school teacher is now in his 30th year of comedy and is nearing 6000 lifetime performances. He is a past winner of the Las Vegas Comedy Festival and appeared recently at Caesar's Palace as part of the HBO Comedy Festival. He has spent the last eight years as the opening act for the legendary Johnny Mathis and did multiple shows all over the country with the late, great Joan Rivers. He has also been seen in concert with The Smothers Brothers, Smokey Robinson, Kenny Rogers, Dolly Parton, Lewis Black, George Jones, Glen Campbell, Pam Tillis and many others. Coast to coast all over North America isn't the only place Brad performs. In 2014 Brad headlined in Singapore, Hong Kong, The MGM in Macau and did eight nights in Israel as part of the Comedy for Koby benefit. His new CD entitled, "Brad Uptonogood" is heard regularly on Sirius Satellite Radio and is available online wherever music is sold. He also just released his first DVD entitled, "Brad Upton, Live from the 509".

programme.title: Ty Barnett - Yep
programme.desc: Ty Barnett, a Chicago native, got his start at Seattle’s Comedy Underground. Whoopi Goldberg called Ty “hilarious” and reviewers have said he is “thought provoking” and “edgy”. All this praise earned him many television appearances. He hosted the Food Network’s Mealin’ and Dealin’, Discovery Family’s Babies Behaving Badly and Beasts Behaving Badly, and appeared in over 15 national commercials. It all began when he was one of the two finalists on the most-watched and Emmy nominated season of Last Comic Standing. Ty went on to multiple Tonight Show appearances where Jay Leno called Ty “one of the funniest comedians working”. He also appeared in HBO’s Bad Boys of Comedy, his own Comedy Central Presents and one-hour special Issues. Ty was named “one to watch” by the Hollywood Reporter. He’s also been seen on the sitcoms Samantha Who, Til Death, Life in Pieces, NickMom Night Out and Tosh.O. His comedy album, Grown Man-Baby Steps is a favorite on Sirius XM.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Sid Davis - Baggage Claim
programme.desc: This former airline worker hilariously unloads side-splitting baggage on stage. Sid's humor is fueled with A.D.D., a wavering ego, and a grade school teacher wife who views him as a child left behind.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus - A Mild and Skinny Guy
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Jason Hewlett - Father Time
programme.desc: The Award-Winning One-Man Show of Jason Hewlett The Entertainer will have you laughing until it hurts. Comedy, Music, Impressions, and Standing Ovations make Jason the perfect entertainer. His brand of Hilarious G-Rated Entertainment is unlike anything you have ever enjoyed. Over 2,000 shows for more than 1 Million audience members in his incredible career make Jasonís show an event you will remember for years to come.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Nazareth - American by Choice
programme.desc: Award Winning Comedian Nazareth, has been seen by over 40 Million people around the world through live concerts, TV and Radio broadcasts. His list of TV appearances include: Comedy Central, ABC Family, NBC, CBS, and TBN.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brian Bates - Uber Important
programme.desc: Turning to comedy after twenty years in corporate America, Brian Bates jokes about ubering his hecklers home, meeting women while hiking, and people who dont believe in God but do believe in wrestling.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Poolos - One Wife, Two Daughters, and Zero Influence
programme.desc: Mark stands 6'7" weighs in at 350 technically a giant however he is very weak and a wimp. In his routines, he weaves the story of his life as a bumbling jolly giant in his fast engaging storytelling style. He has been compared to Louie Anderson. Mark is a true road dog, performing in 40 states and all across Canada. Mark's ultimate dream is to do a film that people actually will have seen.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Merlin The Return
programme.desc: Merlin, the legendary wizard is stuck inside a terrible nether dimension. Meanwhile, the former stars of Wayne’s World, Highlander, and The Young Ones are stuck in a terrible movie about Merlin, the legendary wizard. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Each Child Is Different
programme.desc: Go in depth with five unique misfits, in a wonderful comedic stew of bullying, dyslexia, fire starting and bean-feeding. Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for Each Child Is Different!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX LIVE - House On Haunted Hill
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic live riffing treatment to this classic horror shocker starring Vincent Price! A millionaire offers $10,000 to a group of strangers to spend the night in The House On Haunted Hill. Join Mike, Kevin, Bill, and Paul F. Tompkins for an unforgetttable night in RiffTrax Live The House On Haunted Hill.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Three Magic Words
programme.desc: Yes, Pork, the delicious substance we've been known to indulge in every now and then here at RiffTrax. And since we buy it using the titular Three Magic Words, we'll always know we've got the best pork. What are the Three Magic Words? Quality, freshness and flavor! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill as they are serenaded about the joys of quality, fresh, flavorful pork. Over...and over...and over again...

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - The Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: Bela Lugosi! An ugly robot! The power of invisibility! A military intelligence officer romancing an ambitious reporter! All of these exciting-sounding elements are undeniably contained within the runtime of The Phantom Creeps! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Families: Earning And Spending
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the educational short Families: Earning And Spending! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill and spend a little well-earned time with Families: Earning and Spending!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Sons Of Hercules
programme.desc: Everyone knows Hercules (or Heracles, if you’re really fun to talk to at parties), the mighty Greek whose heroic exploits included cleaning up tons of horse crap. But not everyone knows his sons, who for some reason went by the name The Sons of Hercules! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Sons of Hercules!

programme.title: Best Of T-Rex Ranch

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School - Episode 201
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro - in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way - they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go "back to school" to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much "fish out of water" at the academy, even with the "cool kids" - Robin and Ava - showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as "library helpers" much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book...isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting The Message - Episode 11
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry brute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession - Episode 203
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the "Knight-a-Kon" in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever "infiltration" mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the "Minitrex" - a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for "Best Costume." The prize: "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1." The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just...about...to get the book when...the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1" is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy...she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective - Episode 13
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show - in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day - Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty - the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.title: The King's Tournament - Episode 204
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights - the Tighty Knighties - are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks "How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero." But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament - she's agreed to be in "princess mode" for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Rabbitouille - Episode 14
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! Stephanie concocts a fabulous cake, and Sneaky Tanya steals the recipe -- but neither knows that pet bunny Daisy has added a secret key ingredient. Will Stephanie's frantic efforts to win at all costs end her friendship with her BFF's? It's Stephanie vs. Tanya on a TV Bake-Off to end all bake-offs! After the duo's rivalry brings Aunt Sophie's Adopt-A-Pet Fair to a disastrous end, a contrite Stephanie wants to make amends with the prize money from a TV Bake-Off show. At home, Stephanie practices baking a delicious cake, and Tanya steals the recipe. But neither girl knows that Stephanie's pet bunny has inadvertently added a secret ingredient, ensuring that no one can repeat the recipe. A frustrated Stephanie freaks out, nearly ending her friendship with the girls - until they discover the bunny's secret and race to help Stephanie win.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: When our heroes are invited back to Darkly's Boarding School, they discover it's a trap set up by Lord Garmadon and his evil replica ninjas created by Garmadon's new Mega-Weapo. Realizing how to correctly wield the Mega-Weapon, Lord Garmadon creates evil replicas of the Ninja to face off with our heroes. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are invited back the Darkly's Boarding School, only to discover it's a trap and now the bad kids have seized control of the school. With the Ninja trapped in the school with the faculty, things spiral out of control as the Evil Replica Ninja arrive. As an awesome battle takes place in the school halls, the Ninja manage to outsmart their evil versions, and warn Lord Garmadon they're ready for whatever else he throws at them.

programme.title: Monster Chef - Episode 205
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his "Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition" cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. "Hot chili makes hot monsters!" Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands - meaning Jestro's - could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. "Nope, not hot enough...waaaay too much garlic....you call that hot?!" (BELCH!)

programme.title: Change Of Address - Episode 15
programme.desc: When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. Naturally, everything that can go wrong does go wrong - especially when the entire house disappears! When Stephanie's mom leaves her in charge of their house for a few days, it's finally Stephanie's chance to prove she can handle responsibility alone. But after fending off Andrea's party plans, a Home Alone-style break-in (by the hapless Snivel, trying to retrieve incriminating evidence of the Mayor's latest scheme), and finally the entire house disappearing ("Uh, think Stephanie's Mom will notice?"), Stephanie comes to appreciate that responsibility is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Ninjaball Run
programme.desc: When the ninja learn that Darreth's Mojo Dojo is to be destroyed and Darreth doesn't have the money to save it, our heroes enter the annual NinjaBall Run to win its cash prize in order to save the dojo. As Lloyd continues to train and unlock his hidden powers, the Ninja learn land developers are going to destroy Darreth's Mojo Dojo unless Darreth can find the money to save it. The Ninja decide to enter their Ninja Tank into the annual NinjaBall Run cross-country rally to try to win its cash prize. Revisiting past characters who also enter the race, the high-speed derby will only grow more dangerous as Garmadon enters his Black Bounty, realizing this is the perfect chance to use his Mega-Weapon and rid the ninja. In the end, the Ninja will discover a few secrets within their Ninja Tank, allowing them to beat Garmadon's Bounty by a millisecond and saving Darreth's Dojo with their well-deserved cash prize. And as a final surprise, the Ninja steal back the Destiny's Bounty and make it their own once again.

programme.title: Knight Out - Episode 206
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then...more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort "Exalted Towers" renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the "high class" resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are "off" at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see...Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters - though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Dive In - Episode 16
programme.desc: Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. The Friends each try to help, with disastrous results. Working summer jobs at the new Heartlake City Pool, Restaurant and Sports Center is fun and games for the Friends - until singing mermaid Andrea gets her very first teenage crush. He's Tad, the new lifeguard, and just the sight of him reduces the normally fearless Andrea to a babbling wimp. The Friends all try to help her out, with less-than stellar results, each attempt resulting in increasing mayhem for Tad until he's terrified of Andrea. Then Andrea discovers that she's been mooning over the wrong boy all along!

programme.title: From Cubs To Kings
programme.desc:
A packed beach in Spain. Thousands of miles from their native home of Africa, a pair of tiny, new-born lion cubs are posing for tourist snapshots. A heart-wrenching sight - they appear hollow-eyed, weak and malnourished. Acting on an anonymous tip, the cubs are impounded in a sanctuary where they undergo medical tests - and the results are grim. They have bacterial infections, bad kidney and liver function, hair loss, lice and an overall poor body condition. They are given the care they need, and they are given names: Yame and George,
Now comes the big question: what is their future? Europe's zoos are already overpopulated with lions. Their lifesavers approach lion whisperer Kevin Richardson. Despite routinely turning down rescued cubs from the cub petting industry, he agrees to take in Yame and George. It is a lifelong commitment. But Richardson has a goal - to release them into his 1,000 hectare reserve in South Africa.
Alongside Kevin Richardson, a team of dedicated veterinarians, scientists, rangers and volunteers work to ensure the cubs make it to adulthood - to one day experience a life of freedom in the land from which they came.
From a miserable existence as a tourist sideshow in Spain to the wild plains of Africa - 'From Cubs to Kings' follows two cubs on their journey to a better future.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''The Island of Tasmania'' - Host Jeff Corwin travels way Down Under to explore the amazing island of Tasmania! Jeff uncovers the ancient secrets of this exotic island, separated from mainland Australia by 150 miles of ocean

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Tortuguero National Park'' - Host Jeff Corwin travels to the remote and beautiful Tortuguero National Park in Costa Rica where he explores this unique and remarkably rich protected ecosystem where freshwater meets the sea.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Henry'' - Scarred by a previous dog attack, a married couple closes the door on future pet adoptions. But, if Brandon can teach a 2-year-old mini-poodle mix, named Henry, how to ring the bell to their hearts, they could open their home to a new furry friend.

programme.title: Europe's Largest Desert
programme.desc:
Near the cold Pyrenees of Iberia, surrounded by ancient and dark green forests, there is an odd land where the rain is so scarce and the wind is always blowing. The soil is poor, there are no trees and the landscape has become very much like the moon. Is this what the future of desertification will look like?
This strange landscape is home to incredible creatures with surprising behaviours. We'll discover a place with a very dry skin but a wet hidden heart that allows even aquatic birds or amphibians to live. Living in such conditions is not easy and it's only the toughest animals that will survive.

programme.title: Rock the Park

programme.title: Rock the Park

programme.title: The Voyager with Josh Garcia

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin

programme.desc: In this iconic scene, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E10 | Family Ties
programme.desc: An elderly farmer turns up missing, police believe she is on another one of her party vacations with a new boyfriend. Things start to get complicated after her daughter shows up in the visions of a psychic hired by the family.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E11 | Fatal Extraction
programme.desc: A Pennsylvania town is shaken to the core after a local dentist becomes the victim of a grisly and gory murder. When a local man is falsely accused, it is up to psychic sisters, to unravel the clues and bring the actual murderer to justice.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E12 | Femme Fatality
programme.desc: A young woman recently moved to DC to pursue a bright future, and her disappearance leaves everybody shocked and distressed. A psychic sees puzzling and ambiguous visions that might not offer much help, but the psychic knows she has to be persistent.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E13 | Suddenly Psychic
programme.desc: LA Police find the burned truck of a carjacking victim but they fail to find her body. A soon-to-be psychic gets her first vision, which leads police to a corpse. Police fail to believe her story, and detectives make the psychic their number-one suspect.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E14 | Halloween Homicide
programme.desc: Halloween thrills turn all too real when police find the bodies of two young women, both stabbed to death. Police have no leads about the cold-hearted killer, but a pair of psychics put their heads together to bring the Halloween criminal to justice.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S3 E15 | Taken By Storm
programme.desc: When the captain of a lobster boat vanishes, his family and crew will do anything to find him before the icy conditions of the Atlantic take his life. A psychic draws on her abilities to discover the missing captain's location.

programme.title: Weird or What? with William Shatner | Marathon Edition

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S1 E2 | The Buzzard Coulee Fireball and Whitecourt Crater, Canada

programme.desc: A 5 year old lost Indian survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Based on the beloved novels and featuring an all-star cast, PADDINGTON follows a young bear who finds himself in a series of comic misadventures while trying to avoid a museum taxidermist.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: The public Crawford was strong-willed, glamorous and admirable, but "Mommie Dearest" reveals the private Crawford, the woman desperate to be a mother, adopting her children when she was single and trying to survive in the devastating movie industry.

programme.title: Detective Story
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas stars as the rigid detective whose personal code has become twisted from dealing with too many criminals. Eleanor Parker is his wife, tormented by a guilty secret.

programme.title: Anne Tyler's Saint Maybe
programme.desc: The story of a young man seeking forgiveness for his brother's death. Stars Mary Louise Parker and Blythe Danner. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: After his mother dies, a college dropout befriends a patient at a health-care center who gives him support and guidance. Stars Vanessa Redgrave. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Goodnight for Justice
programme.desc: When John Goodnight was a boy he watched in the weeds as his family was killed in a ruthless outlaw attack. Now as a circuit judge of the western territories, Goodnight travels the west protecting the innocent from injustice.

programme.title: Goodnight for Justice: Queen of Hearts
programme.desc: Judge John Goodnight comes to the rescue of a beautiful woman whose stagecoach comes under attack. After making their escape, Goodnight discovers that the woman may have been a prisoner.

programme.title: Goodnight for Justice: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: Circuit judge John Goodnight reunites with old flame Callie Bluepointe and discovers her hometown is under siege by an outlaw. Goodnight is determined to bring an end to the outlaw's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Fairfield Road
programme.desc: Noah McManus finds out his new boss in Washington is a corrupt Senator who can no longer employ him and that his girlfriend has been cheating on him. Devastated, Noah travels to a quaint Cape Cod town.

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After getting fired, a man winds up working for his wife's father while she takes care of the baby.

programme.title: Sexy Evil Genius
programme.desc: A group of guys are drawn to the same bar in downtown Los Angeles by an ex-girlfriend they all have in common.

programme.title: Kill Switch
programme.desc: A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

programme.desc: After getting fired, a man winds up working for his wife's father while she takes care of the baby.

programme.title: Sexy Evil Genius
programme.desc: A group of guys are drawn to the same bar in downtown Los Angeles by an ex-girlfriend they all have in common.

programme.title: Along Came the Devil
programme.desc: After a troubled childhood, Ashley searches for a connection and unknowingly invites in a demonic force, leaving her loved ones to fight for her soul.

programme.title: The Bone Snatcher

programme.title: Danika

programme.desc: When a small Colorado town is overrun by the flesh hungry dead, a small group of survivors try to escape in a last ditch effort to stay alive. Starring Mena Suvari.

programme.title: Noah

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Super-spies Gregorio (Antonio Banderas) and Ingrid (Carla Gugino) give up their lives of intrigue to raise their children. After a sinister super-villain kidnaps the parents, it's up to the kids to come to the rescue.

programme.desc: McCall finds her loyalties sharply divided when an important murder case being prosecuted by the Assistant District Attorney, with whom she is in love, is jeopardized by Hunter.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall try to solve a bank robbery and murder while coping with the double and triple-crossing schemes of a criminal who once saved Hunter's life.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: When the husband of a policewoman is murdered, evidence of wife abuse makes Hunter and McCall suspect the woman's patrol partner who knew about the beatings.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: A veteran police dispatcher is blackmailed into undermining Hunter's and McCall's investigation of a multimillion-dollar gold robbery when her son is kidnapped.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall learn that a bizarre murder is a biochemist's effort to conceal the killing of a woman's husband in order to win her.

programme.title: Hunter - Season 5
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall follow a trail of revenge and fraud while investigating the murder of a thoroughbred racehorse.

programme.title: Valentine's Date
programme.desc: A couple desperate to get divorced must survive the craziest weekend of their lives to gain their freedom from each other.

programme.title: Take A Stan
programme.desc: Lisa James, a Sociology Professor, escapes her abusive husband, Stan, and seeks refuge with one of her students. How long will it take before Stan finds out where she has been hiding?

programme.title: Prodigal Husband
programme.desc: Ex-NFL player Kedar Ellis is depressed about his future after a career ending injury. His loyal wife Lydia encourages him to find another way to make a living. Unbeknownst to him he is tempted, loses faith and leaves. Left alone to run the household, Lydia has to keep the family afloat, but first, she must find faith, strength and forgiveness!

programme.title: Her Happy Place
programme.desc: Tasha lost her job and her boyfriend. Even worse, she lost the love for herself. Her friend Felicia helps her time travel to find when she lost her self love hoping they can get it back.

programme.title: The Turnaround
programme.desc: The Turnaround is a story about a young guy named Marquise whose faith is challenged by the loss of both of his parents at an early age. He begins to drift towards street crime and away from his writing ambitions. A tragic event places him in a precarious position wherein he must choose between good and evil.

programme.title: DWB: Dating While Black
programme.desc: DWB: Dating While Black is a very honest and comedic look at the dating process of through the eyes of several individuals. Two former co-workers, Eric and Alex, have been recently laid off of their jobs and they run into each other on a job interview. While searching for new jobs, they forge a personal relationship that involves Alex, a womanizing ladies' man, helping the naive and recently dumped Eric understand women better. Along the path are various dating scenarios from different characters that come in and out of the lives of both Alex and Eric who all demonstrate the struggles, strains, and triumphs of Dating While Black.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 3

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1

Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.
